edu.iastate.ansci.flip.database

Class HerdStudentDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iastate.ansci.flip.database.HerdStudentDatabase

  • public class HerdStudentDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage functionality filters for selected herds: -Enable/disable Matings, -Enable/disable AI Matings, -Enable/disable transferring of animals between herds, -Enable/disable animals for culling, -Enable/disable the renaming of animals

    • Method Detail

      • saveNewHerdStudent

        public static void saveNewHerdStudent(int populationID,
                                      java.lang.String instructor,
                                      int herdID,
                                      boolean enableMating,
                                      boolean enableAIMating,
                                      boolean enableTransfer,
                                      boolean enableCulls,
                                      boolean enableRename)
        Save Herd's filters for a selected herd. This methods allows an instructor to set what attributes are allowed to be seen by the owner of this selected herd.
        Parameters:
        populationID - : Identifier of the selected herd's population
        instructor - : Owner (username) of the selected herd.
        herdID - : Identifier of the selected herd :
        enableMating - : If true it allows matings in selected herd, otherwise set false
        enableAIMating - : If true it allows AI matings in selected herd, otherwise set false
        enableTransfer - : If true it allows to propose transferring of animals from the selected herd, otherwise set false
        enableCulls - : If true it allows to propose animals for culling, otherwise set false
        enableRename - : If true it allows the change of the animals' names of a selected herd, otherwise set false

      • readHerdStudentObject

        public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.Object> readHerdStudentObject(int populationID,
                                                                       int herdID)
        Read filters of a selected herd. Use this method when populationID > 0
        Parameters:
        populationID - : Identifier of the selected herd's population
        herdID - : Identifier of the selected herd.
        Returns:
        List of herd's attributes forbidden to be seen by the owner of this herd.

      • readHerdStudentObject

        public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.Object> readHerdStudentObject(int populationID,
                                                                       java.lang.String username,
                                                                       int herdID)
        Read filters of a selected herd. This method can be used either when populationID is < 0 or > 0
        Parameters:
        populationID - : Identifier of the selected herd's population
        username - : Owner (username) of the selected herd's population.
        herdID - : Identifier of the selected herd.
        Returns:
        List of herd's attributes forbidden to be seen by the owner of this herd.

      • readMatingEnable

        public static boolean readMatingEnable(int populationID,
                                       int herdID)
        Check if selected herd of the selected population can propose and execute matings
        Parameters:
        populationID - : Identifier of the selected population. Use only when populationID > 0
        herdID - : Identifier of the selected herd
        Returns:
        true, if matings are allowed. Otherwise false

      • readMatingEnable

        public static java.lang.Boolean readMatingEnable(java.lang.String instructor,
                                                 int herdID)
        Check if selected herd of the selected active population can propose and execute matings
        Parameters:
        username - : Owner of the selected active population. Owner is assumed to be online.
        herdID - : Identifier of the selected herd
        Returns:
        true, if matings are allowed. Otherwise false

      • readAllEnable

        public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.Boolean> readAllEnable(int populationID,
                                                                java.lang.String instructor,
                                                                int herdID)
        Read filters of a selected herd that enable/disable: matings, AI matings, transferring of animals, culling of animals and renaming of the animals.
        Parameters:
        populationID - : Identifier of selected population
        instructor - : Owner (username) of the selected population
        herdID - : Identifier of a selected herd of the selected population.
        Returns:
        List of filters

      • updateMatingEnable

        public static void updateMatingEnable(java.lang.String username,
                                      int herdID,
                                      boolean value)
        Disable/enable mating for a selected herd. This method has to be executed on an active population
        Parameters:
        username - : Owner of the active population
        herdID - : Identifier of the selected herd
        value - : true = enable matings. False = disable matings.
